data.title: Learn a New Language and Never Forget It— Fluent Forever by Gabriel Wyner
data.meta_description: This highly practical book by an accomplished polyglot is perfect for anyone starting to (or smack in the middle of) learning a language (or two or more). Fluent Forever, by the mastermind behind the…
data.text:
If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart. — Nelson Mandela

Americans who travel abroad for the first time are often shocked to discover that, despite all the progress that has been made in the last 30 years, many foreign people still speak in foreign languages. — Dave Barry
